meanings.definition: In a way that is unambiguously clear and definite.
meanings.sent1: She categorically stated her decision to leave.
meanings.sent2: He categorically denied any involvement in the incident.
meanings.sent3: The cat categorically refused to eat the new food.
meanings.sent4: The sun categorically rose in the east every morning.
meanings.sent5: The teacher categorically declared the correct answer.

meanings.sent1: The rule was categorically enforced by the principal.
meanings.sent2: I categorically reject the idea of giving up.
meanings.sent3: The dog categorically ignored the command to sit.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was categorically brighter than the sun.
meanings.sent5: The storm categorically destroyed the old barn.
